info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient
info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to manage role assignments. A role eligibility grants access to Azure Active Directory users.

get.description: Gets role eligibility schedule instances of a role eligibility schedule.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role eligibility schedule.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignment schedules at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignment schedules at, above or below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=asRequestor() to return all role eligibility schedules requested by the current user. Use $filter=asTarget() to return all role eligibility schedules created for the current user.

200.description: OK - Returns array of role eligibility schedule instances.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified role eligibility schedule instance.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role eligibility schedules.

parameters.name: roleEligibilityScheduleInstanceName
parameters.description: The name (hash of schedule name + time) of the role eligibility schedule to get.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the role eligibility schedule instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

principalId.description: Returns role eligibility schedule instances of the specific principal.

roleDefinitionId.description: Returns role eligibility schedule instances of the specific role definition.

status.description: Returns role eligibility schedule instances of the specific status.

roleEligibilityScheduleId.description: Returns role eligibility schedule instances belonging to a specific role eligibility schedule.

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

roleEligibilityScheduleId.description: Id of the master role eligibility schedule

status.description: The status of the role eligibility schedule instance

startDateTime.description: The startDateTime of the role eligibility schedule instance

endDateTime.description: The endDateTime of the role eligibility schedule instance

memberType.description: Membership type of the role eligibility schedule

condition.description: The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase 'foo_storage_container'

conditionVersion.description: Version of the condition. Currently accepted value is '2.0'

createdOn.description: DateTime when role eligibility schedule was created

RoleEligibilityScheduleInstancePropertie.description: Role eligibility schedule properties with scope.

id.description: The role eligibility schedule instance ID.

name.description: The role eligibility schedule instance name.

type.description: The role eligibility schedule instance type.

RoleEligibilityScheduleInstance.description: Information about current or upcoming role eligibility schedule instance

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

RoleEligibilityScheduleInstanceListResul.description: Role eligibility schedule instance list operation result.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.
